documents.text:
STUDYDADDY
  • How it Works
  • Homework Answers
  • Ask a Question
  • Top Tutors

Privacy policy

StudyDaddy.com, founded and operated by StudyDaddy, has developed the following Privacy Policy with a view to helping users and visitors understand our ways of data collection and storage. Our Privacy Policy is designed to encourage you to make informed decisions when it comes to using our service located at StudyDaddy.com (hereinafter referred as “the Website”). When visiting or using the Website, you agree to follow all the rules listed in this Privacy Policy.

In case of an unresolved issue regarding privacy or personal information usage that was not addressed successfully, contact us.

Personally Identifiable Information

You can generally visit our Website without having to submit any personally identifiable information about yourself to us.

If you set up an account with us on the Website, we will collect personally identifiable information that you include in the registration or submission form, such as your email address, profile photo and username. If you set up an account with us on the Website, post a question or answer or other information in our Website, we will collect any personally identifiable information that you include in your submission or posting.

If you contact us with questions or request information we will collect your email address and any other personally identifiable information that you voluntarily transmit with your communications to us.

Information we collect as you browse our website

The statistical data our webserver collects as you browse the website includes information about your IP address, the type of browser you are using, your operating system, and access times. Sometimes, cookies can be used to customize the content of our webpages, based on your browser type, IP address, or other anonymous information.

About cookies

Cookies are text files used to identify a computer to a server. Cookies identify which computer is being used, not a specific individual user. This tool is used by many different websites to monitor visitor traffic. Cookies gather information about areas of a website that users visit, and the time spent on a particular page. On our Website, cookies are used to serve the following functions:

  • To remember that a user is in the process of making an order.
  • To remember that a user is signed in.
  • To display the date and time in accordance with the user's timezone.
  • To improve user experience and make website navigation more convenient.

Users can modify browser settings to accept all cookies to receive a notification every time a cookie is used, or not to receive cookies at all. In case of the last option, the user might not be able to use some personalized services.

Usage of the Collected Data

On some webpages, you may be asked to provide some personal information, including your e-mail address. Please note that such information is never sold, rented or shared with any third party. We employ your information in these ways:

  • Service supply and order completion
  • Account administration
  • Confirmation sending
  • Sharing service updates along with a requested product
  • Improving customer service
  • Sharing significant updates
  • Handling your inquires and concerns
  • Modifying our marketing communications and the Website
  • Conducting research and analyzing results
Opt-Out

Users willing to unsubscribe from our newsletters and other marketing materials can do so by following the instructions provided in the aforementioned emails. If for some reason, you are unable to do it, contact us. We strongly recommend our users to create profiles and fill them in with the required information, i.e. photos, descriptions, etc. However, we don’t take any responsibility regarding the actions of users who you decided to share your information with. When registering at the Website, every user creates a personal account. So, their usernames and emails are automatically attached to the documents/programs/pictures they upload. Note that any other personal details are not provided to third parties.

Disclosure of Your Personal Data

We reserve the right to disclose your personal information to third parties under certain circumstances described in this Privacy policy. We never share, sell, trade or distribute your individual info to other parties for promotional purposes. However, we might transfer your personal data to our service providers, partners and affiliates who assist us in our business operations, i.e. order delivery or handling customer requests. Such entities are authorized to access your information only when it is necessary to provide the needed services.

There are several other cases when we may disclose personal information of our users:

  • Whenever it is required by law in order to comply with the rules and regulations;
  • Whenever the disclosure is necessary to protect the rights and safety of our company. investigate a fraudulent action or fulfill a request from the government;
  • Whenever the company is involved into mergers and acquisitions that lead to a sale of its assets, we notify our users via email or by posting a note at the Website;
  • Whenever you grant us your consent for information disclosure.

The company can share your individual details with entities to help them better market their products to you. If you find this disturbing or unacceptable, please notify us via our email. Please remember that in order to successfully complete all the transactions, we disclose some of your personal details to users you transact with via our Website.

Links

When browsing the Website, you may notice links to other web pages. The Website cannot be liable for the privacy approaches accepted at those pages. Therefore, we encourage you to stay alert whenever you leave our Website. Make sure to read privacy policy sections of other sites in order to learn how they collect and store your information. This Privacy policy in particular refers only to StudyDaddy.com.

Personal Data and Your Rights

StudyDaddy respects and complies with the EU General Data Protection Regulations.

You have a right to be informed of Personal Data processed by Website, to request access to the information we have on you, a right to rectification/correction, erasure and restriction of processing.

You also have the right to receive from Website a structured, common and machine-readable format of Personal Data you provided to us.

If you believe the information we have about you is incorrect, you are welcome to contact us so we can update it and keep your data accurate. If you have any questions or comments, or if you want to update, delete, or change any Personal Data we hold, or you have a concern about the way in which we have handled any privacy matter, please use our contact form to send us a message. You may also contact us by email at: support@studydaddy.com.

Modifying Account Information

Users have a right to change, remove or edit information at their accounts whenever they find it necessary. All that is required to do is to log into your Account page, make changes and save those. The updates will instantly show up. You are also welcome to contact us so we can update your information.

Information Security

All the necessary measures are taken to ensure the highest level of protection for users’ information. We store account detail on a protected server. Due to the fact that chat messages are not considered to be secure, we recommend you to send private details by private massages.

Information security is a top priority for us. Whenever you are asked to provide sensitive details, i.e. credit card information, you can be safe in knowledge that all the data is secured. We use the latest technologies to encrypt every transaction.

There are general standards of information protection that we always follow in our operations. Every transaction is protected at all stages, from entering personal data to completing a payment. Whether you want to know more about security or have questions, contact us via email support@studydaddy.com.

Retention of Your Information

We can retain your personal data as long as you are using our service whilst keeping your account active. If you decide to delete your account or ask us to remove all your information from our database, contact our administrators.

Signing Up with Other Services

Users can utilize other sign-in services, i.e. Facebook, to log in to the Website. By doing so, you allow the chosen service to identify you and provide this information to the Website. You will be asked for your email and name in a pop-up form. Please provide those to complete the log-in process. When using sign-in services, you get an option of posting any info at your profile page and share it via the chosen network.

Unauthorized accounts

We remove any unauthorized accounts. therefore, if you notice any – please contact us.

Modifications in the Privacy Policy

In case we make changes to the current privacy policy, we will place a notice to the Current Page and other pages we find appropriate. In addition, we may send out an email alert so that you get full information about modifications, reasoning behind those and guidelines if necessary.

We keep the right to make changes to this Privacy Policy at any time. Therefore, it is solely your responsibility to read it and learn about any modifications.

Restrictions Regarding the Age

If your age is under 13 years old, under no circumstances can you visit the Website and use our service. If we find out that people under 13 y.o. use the Website and we have already collected their information, due measures will be taken and such information will be deleted.

Last Update: May 10th, 2018

Terms of Use

PLEASE CAREFULLY READ THESE TERMS OF USE, AS these Terms of Use (the “Terms”) are a binding contract between you and StudyDaddy.com (“StudyDaddy,” “we” and “us”).

These Terms of Use govern your right to use of the Services, regardless of how you access them, whether by computer, mobile device, or otherwise. and regardless of whether you are a registered user or a guest. By using the Services, you agree to and accept all of the Terms of Use. If you do not agree to the Terms of Use, you are not authorized to use the Services and you must cease all such use immediately. We reserve the right to modify these Terms of use at any time by posting a notice on the Site, or by sending you a notice via email. You shall be responsible for reviewing and becoming familiar with any such modifications. Such modifications are effective immediately upon first posting or notification.

StudyDaddy.com offers a marketplace for those seeking tutoring services (Students) to connect with those seeking to provide tutoring services (Tutors/Experts). Students are responsible for selecting the right tutor for their needs. In making hiring decisions, Students should review and investigate each tutor's self-reported education, and experience, as well as reviews from other students on his StudyDaddy.com Profile.

In Our Terms of use:

“Website” means StudyDaddy.com

“User” means anyone who accesses and/or registers/view our Services, including without limitation Students, tutors, Guardian/Parents or other users.

“Tutors/Experts” means Experts, tutors, and anyone who provides answers, online courses, instruction, tutoring and learning services through our Services.

“Company”, “We” or “Our” mean and refer to StudyDaddy.com
“Product” an assignment, paper, and/or other written product, which is drafted and delivered to the customer in accordance with its order.

“Tutorials” an access tutor’s posted specific answers (“Tutorials”) to already submitted questions named as Tutorials (These are already Used Papers).

Eligibility

We operate in accordance with the “COPPA” (Children’s Online Privacy Protection Act passed in 1998). Therefore, we provide our services only to the individuals whose age is 18 y.o. and more. According to COPPA, any online service providers is obligated to get parental consent before collecting any personal data of a customer under 13 years old. We never solicit any personal information from children under 13. That is why any underage user should be prohibited from registering at our platform. If your age is between 13 and 18, we insist that you read these terms with your parent or guardian, who should be over 21 y.o. in order to confirm that you agree to our terms and will inevitably follow those.

Our services

You acknowledge and agree that StudyDaddy.com services are provided for the purpose of learning, information or guide only not cheating. You are not to inquire or hire tutors to complete assignments, write papers, take quizzes or otherwise do work on your login of your behalf. Further, you are not to use StudyDaddy.com services for any purpose that violates the academic honesty policy or other conduct policies of your school, university, academic institution or workplace.

By submitting the order and/or payment, you are purchasing the product for your personal, non-commercial, use only. All products are drafted by freelance writers who transferred all rights and ownership regarding the products to the company. All products are non-refundable and come with no warranties, expressed or implied. It is your obligation to read these Terms and Conditions and Help page, before submitting any order and/or payment to this website. We are not responsible for editing, modifying, filtering, screening, monitoring, endorsing or guaranteeing any delivered Content. Note that we DO NOT provide any answers or academic and/or educational content ourselves, and we are not liable for any acts or omissions of Users, the accuracy or completeness of their answers or even their ability to provide answers. Content is to be used for general information purposes only, not as a substitute for Academic Answers.

Copyright

Users should remember about copyright laws that imply to all the content we share. By accepting the terms, users promise to abide by all the intellectual property laws and trademark rules established by StudyDaddy.com. Users have no legal right to copy, upload, transmit, distribute, reproduce, sell or modify any StudyDaddy.com’s content (1) without the consent issued by the company or (2) use it in a way that does not respect the intellectual property rights, including those of StudyDaddy.com.

Users should understand and accept the fact that the company is the only owner of all the rights for services and products it provides in and to all of its patents, inventions, copyrights, trademarks, domain names, trade secrets, know-how and any other intellectual property and/or proprietary rights in and to the services as well as all content. It is forbidden to make changes, publish, reproduce (except for the cases when stated otherwise) or anyhow exploit any works or services delivered by the company.

In certain cases, users can copy and download some pieces of information. However, you should not think that if this option exists, other regulations might not be applicable.

The company has a right to cancel any agreement or break the contract with any expert who delivers unoriginal or plagiarized products. You should accept the fact that no product can be passed to any third party, sold or anyhow distributed for any non-personal purpose. It is essential to acknowledge that if the company has a doubt regarding your usage of our product, it can cancel your membership and stop any form of cooperation with you.

According to the intellectual property law, signing the delivered product as yours is considered plagiarism. Any written material provided by StudyDaddy.com should be implemented solely for reference or research. We never encourage nor take part in distributing plagiarized content. StudyDaddy.com condones dishonesty and fraud of any type. We strictly follow intellectual property rules, and we will never allow our customers to violate such rules. Therefore, it is vital to accept the fact that all the materials displayed on the website or purchased by customers must be used only as examples or research materials. Any idea, quote or statistics taken from our materials/products should be properly cited and referenced to the website. The company and its partners, experts and other affiliates should not be legally responsible for any illegal, inappropriate or any other wrong usage of the written materials obtained from StudyDaddy.com. This may include plagiarism, detention, expulsion, low grading, loss of grants/scholarships, academic failure and any other legal and disciplinary punishment. The customers take all the responsibilities for causing any disciplinary/legal actions when using our materials in an illegal and unethical way.

Use

StudyDaddy.com allows all the registered students to reach out to experts (who represent certain entities or operate individually). Note that tutors are not agents nor employees at StudyDaddy.com. Customer can also access tutor’s posted specific answers (“Tutorials”) to already submitted questions named as Tutorials (These are already Used Papers). It is solely a customer’s decision to purchase a tutorial or hire an expert in order to get answers to his/her questions. Every user should bear several obligations in mind.

In terms of site usage, you must:

  1. Be of legal age in order to accept the Terms and abide by them
  2. To provide actual, complete and correct information when registering at the website ('registration data')
  3. Not to disclose your login info to anyone in order to maintain the security of your personal info
  4. To keep all the contact/personal information provided to StudyDaddy.com up to date
  5. To take responsibility for any risks regarding unauthorized access to your registration data and personal details

Every user must agree to utilize the website and its services in a lawful, ethical and proper manner. Any offensive, illegal, inappropriate or otherwise improper usage of StudyDaddy.com will lead to termination of the contract between the company and the user. StudyDaddy.com has a right not to send out any notifications regarding suspension.

Users should carefully read and remember the following points that may lead to the termination of cooperation between them and the company.

  • Any violation of legal rights, including intellectual property rights and rights to personal security. This also includes verbal abuse, cyber bullying, stalking, threatening and defaming of others.
  • Uploading, distributing, publishing any illegal, hateful, inappropriate or disrespectful materials, topics, names and other data.
  • Using the website and its services for purposes that violate local, national and international regulations, including work and hourly wage related laws.
  • Sharing and uploading files containing any materials violating copyrights and other decrees and regulations.
  • Purposely uploading files containing malicious software and viruses, like Trojan horses, worms, cancel bots and any similar programs that may cause unamendable damage, disrupt, disable or undermine operations of any computer system, device or network.
  • Making an attempt to obtain unauthorized access to user accounts or any other website-related systems.
  • Behaving in a way or taking an action that may harm the website.
  • Publicizing, advertising and selling products or services that are not relevant to the company.
  • Operating on behalf of another person or giving personal information to another person/entity to get services from StudyDaddy.com.
  • Spamming of any kind is not allowed. Users that continuously spam will be banned from the website.
  • Downloading files of other people whom you know or have been acquainted to. Such distribution practice is illegal at StudyDaddy.com.
  • Obtaining, copying, replicating or extracting any content or materials from the website by means of illegal methods/malware, i.e. bots, hacking programs, scrapers, etc.
  • Restricting other users from joining and using the website.
  • Duplicating, selling, copying or exploiting information from the website for any commercial purposes.
  • Purposely providing incorrect personal details or using information of existing users to benefit from the service.
  • Taking the work of other people and submitting it as your own.
  • Selling our materials or products to third parties.
  • Advertising services (their names and websites) that we do not partner with at StudyDaddy.com.

StudyDaddy.com doesn’t claim any copyright in regards to the content you upload to the website and has no obligation to follow respect this content. As long as it is not stated otherwise, all the content coming from our customers is deemed to be created on a non-confidential basis. Therefore, the company has a legal right to remove such content without sending a notification to the person who posted it. In addition, by posting any piece of information at StudyDaddy.com, you give us a right to change, distribute, publish, share, adapt and resell it with a view to assisting you.

Users who violated StudyDaddy’s Terms or are involved in fraudulent financial activity can be blocked.

Payment

You understand and agree to abide by StudyDaddy’s tutor and student payment policies. You agree that you are willing to pay all costs through StudyDaddy. These costs include but are not limited to price as listed.

It is your responsibility to get yourself acquainted with the payment-related nuances and try to avoid those.

  1. The customer should not chargeback any expenses paid when purchasing a product from StudyDaddy.com. If you do a chargeback, Site has a right to immediately suspend your account.
  2. Tutors/Experts receive payment from Students via the Site only. StudyDaddy does not condone or in any way participate or become a party to any off-site transactions between users of the Site. Site reserves the right to suspend Relevant Users accounts involving off-Site transaction.

Revision and Refund Policy

We assess refund requests on a case-by-case basis as there are usually unique reasons why a refund request is made. Unsatisfactory answers are answers that are either overdue, or fail to follow the instructions outlined in the question's description. If you receive an unsatisfactory answer, the first thing you should do is ask the tutor to revise the answer. If this does not resolve your dispute and you feel it necessary to make a refund request, contact support team with the reason for your refund request and explain why the answer is unsatisfactory. Please note, we may require documented proof that the quality of your order is low. The support agent will go over the answer to see if it meets the requirements and our internal guidelines for quality. If the answer do not meet the requirements, the student's money are refunded. We offer 10 days to request a refund in case you were dissatisfied with the answer. Once the Refund Period elapses, we will not refund any amounts paid.

Customer can seek revision of the product if it does not meet the specifications provided by the Customer. Once the customer completes the order and rates tutor is deemed as completion of the job to the satisfaction of the Customer, and no money will be refunded.

After the answer was posted we offer 10 days to send us any complaints or revision requests. After 10 days money will be sent to the Tutor automatically. Please, review your order carefully. Once the amount is received by the Tutor, it is deemed that the work is complete and is to your satisfaction and no refund will be made.

If your order is late because you did not provide required information or materials on time, then you cannot claim a refund based on lateness. Please, be advised that it is very important to provide requirements as the time you place your order.

If a revision request violates the original instructions, StudyDaddy has the right to decline it.

Revision Policy is not applied to the purchased Tutorials. All tutorials are non-refundable and come with no warranties, expressed or implied. Once an order has been completed, the company does not grant refunds under any circumstances, unless specifically stated herein. Products are for research, reference, informational and entertainment purposes only. It is the customers responsibility to read and understand this policy prior to purchase.

Additional Tutor Terms

You acknowledge and agree that you are solely responsible for all answers and tutorials that you make available through the StudyDaddy. Accordingly, you represent and warrant that: (i) you are the original creator and writer of all Answers and Tutorials that you make available through the StudyDaddy or you have all rights, licenses, consents and releases that are necessary to grant to StudyDaddy the ownership in such Answers and Tutorials, as contemplated under these Terms. (ii) neither the Answers and Tutorials nor your posting, uploading, publication, submission or transmittal of the Answers and Tutorials or StudyDaddy’s use of the Answers and Tutorials (or any portion thereof) on, through or by means of the StudyDaddy will infringe, misappropriate or violate a third party’s patent, copyright, trademark, trade secret, moral rights or other proprietary or intellectual property rights, or rights of publicity or privacy, or result in the violation of any applicable law or regulation. and (iii) your Answers and Tutorials and your postings will not defame any person, business, location or property.

Answers and Tutorials are not private or confidential and may be read, collected, and used by others. To better protect your privacy, do not include information regarding your identity or contact information in Answers and Tutorials that you post or upload to the StudyDaddy. You are fully responsible for all Answers and Tutorials you contribute, in any manner, to the StudyDaddy, and for the accuracy of the same, and you represent and warrant you have all rights necessary to do so, in the manner in which you contribute it, and that StudyDaddy shall not need to obtain any licenses, rights, consents, or permissions from, or make any payments to, any third party for any use or exploitation of your Answers and Tutorials in any and all media, whether now known or hereafter created, or have any liability to you or any third party as a result of any use of your Answers and Tutorials as authorized in these Terms.

After submitting your Answers and Tutorials to the StudyDaddy, StudyDaddy will own your Answers and Tutorials. Your hereby assign and agree to assign to StudyDaddy all right, title and interest in and to your Answers and Tutorials. At the same time, StudyDaddy grants you a nonexclusive, non-transferable, revocable, limited license to use and distribute your own Answers and Tutorials, for as long as StudyDaddy allows and unless and until StudyDaddy requests you to cease such use and/or distribution. Subject to the foregoing, you continue to have the right to use your Answers and Tutorials in any way you choose. You waive any and all rights of privacy, publicity, or any other rights of a similar nature in connection with the use of the Answers and Tutorials, or of your name, personality, likeness, image or voice in connection with offering, delivering, marketing, promoting, demonstrating and selling your Answers and Tutorials, or any advertising or publicity relating thereto. You understand and agree that if you delete your account, it may not be possible to completely delete that content from StudyDaddy’s records, and that StudyDaddy will retain ownership of your Answers and Tutorials and your Answers and Tutorials will remain viewable elsewhere as part of the StudyDaddy and to the extent that they were downloaded or stored by other Users.

In addition to the obligations applicable to all Users, you agree to the below terms if you sign up as a Tutor through the StudyDaddy.

  • You have the required qualifications, credentials and expertise to offer answers, instruction and materials, and that any credentials you post are accurate, truthful, complete, and not misleading;
  • You will not use the StudyDaddy for any business other than for providing tutoring, teaching and instructional services to registered Users;
  • You will respond to Users seeking your services in a timely fashion, so as to ensure quality of service to Users;
  • You will not submit any false or misleading answers or information, or submit any proposal with a price that you do not intend to honor;
  • You can only create one account with us and may not transfer or sell your account to anyone else. Creating multiply accounts is forbidden. Dublicated accounts will be permanently banned.
  • You may not and you agree that you will not share personal contacts. This includes your first and last name, email address, Skype ID, phone number, social network usernames, etc. You may not ask the student for login details to university websites. In case of any violation of these Terms, the tutor account would be immediately terminated without any compensation or refunds.
  • By applying and participating in the paper writing services provided through this Website, you are representing to us that you are a qualified writer in good standing. Providing false or incomplete information will result in being barred from the system and / or withholding of all payments due to the writer, under these Terms.
  • You may not and you agree that you will not advertise of any external homework assistance services via StudyDaddy platform.
  • You may not boost your profile with fake reviews.
  • Do not apply to the question if you are unable to provide the quality answer in time. Your StudyDaddy account can be blocked due to a large amount of refunds.

Due to the infraction of regulations your account would be suspended or banned.

If you’ve been suspended, you will no longer be able to bid on any more questions. You can finish answering and collect payment for any remaining active questions, but will no longer be able to aply on more questions.

Bans are permanent suspensions, and are given to tutors who don’t meet the expectations of the platform. Typically, bans are given to new tutors who prove to not be a good fit, or established tutors who have committed repeat offenses.

If banned, your remaining tutor balance would be withheld to cover liability cost for dissatisfied students and damage done to the StudyDaddy’s reputation.

StudyDaddy may conduct certain verification processes for Tutors to signup on the Services.

Warranty Disclaimer

StudyDaddy does not make any representations or warranties concerning any content contained in or accessed through the Services, and we will not be responsible or liable for the accuracy, copyright compliance, legality, or decency of material contained in or accessed through the Services. We make no representations or warranties regarding suggestions or recommendations of services or products offered or purchased through the Services. Any Content or Services purchased or offered (whether or not following such recommendations and suggestions) through the Services are provided “AS-IS” and without any warranty of any kind from StudyDaddy or others. THE SERVICES AND CONTENT ARE PROVIDED ON AN “AS-IS” BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, WITHOUT LIMITATION, IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, NON-INFRINGEMENT, OR THAT USE OF THE SERVICES WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED OR ERROR-FREE.

STUDYDADDY CANNOT GUARANTEE AND DOES NOT PROMISE ANY SPECIFIC RESULTS FROM USE OF THE SITE. NO ADVICE OR INFORMATION, WHETHER ORAL OR WRITTEN, OBTAINED BY YOU FROM STUDYDADDY OR THE SITE SHALL CREATE ANY WARRANTY NOT EXPRESSLY STATED IN THESE TERMS. YOU AGREE THAT YOUR USE OF THE SITE AND THE SERVICES WILL BE AT YOUR SOLE RISK. TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, STUDYDADDY AND EACH OF ITS ADVERTISERS, LICENSORS, SUPPLIERS, OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, INVESTORS, EMPLOYEES, AGENTS, SERVICE PROVIDERS AND OTHER CONTRACTORS DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED IN CONNECTION WITH THE SITE AND YOUR USE THEREOF.

STUDYDADDY MAKES NO WARRANTIES OR REPRESENTATIONS ABOUT THE ACCURACY OR COMPLETENESS OF THE SITES CONTENT, THE CONTENT OF ANY SITE LINKED TO THE SITE, CONTRIBUTIONS, INFORMATION OR ANY OTHER ITEMS OR MATERIALS ON THE SITE OR LINKED TO BY THE SITE. STUDYDADDY ASSUMES NO LIABILITY OR RESPONSIBILITY FOR ANY (A) ERRORS, MISTAKES OR INACCURACIES OF CONTENT AND MATERIALS, (B) PERSONAL INJURY OR PROPERTY DAMAGE, OF ANY NATURE WHATSOEVER, RESULTING FROM YOUR ACCESS TO AND USE OF THE SITE OR THE SERVICES, (C) ANY UNAUTHORIZED ACCESS TO OR USE OF STUDYDADDY SECURE SERVERS AND/OR ANY AND ALL PERSONAL INFORMATION STORED THEREIN, (D) ANY INTERRUPTION OR CESSATION OF TRANSMISSION TO OR FROM THE SITE, (E) ANY BUGS, VIRUSES, TROJAN HORSES, OR THE LIKE, WHICH MAY BE TRANSMITTED TO OR THROUGH THE SITE BY ANY THIRD PARTY, AND/OR (F) ANY ERRORS OR OMISSIONS IN ANY CONTENT AND MATERIALS OR FOR ANY LOSS OR DAMAGE OF ANY KIND INCURRED AS A RESULT OF THE USE OF ANY CONTENT POSTED, TRANSMITTED, OR OTHERWISE MADE AVAILABLE VIA THE SITE.

SOME STATES OR JURISDICTIONS DO NOT ALLOW THE LIMITATION OR EXCLUSION OF CERTAIN WARRANTIES, OR THE EXCLUSION OR LIMITATION OF CERTAIN DAMAGES. IF YOU RESIDE IN ONE OF THESE STATES OR JURISDICTIONS, THE ABOVE LIMITATIONS OR EXCLUSIONS MAY NOT APPLY TO YOU.

Limitation on Liability

IN NO EVENT SHALL STUDYDADDY OR ANY OF ITS EMPLOYEES, AGENTS, SERVICE PROVIDERS ADVERTISERS, LICENSORS, SUPPLIERS, OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, INVESTORS AND OTHER CONTRACTORS BE LIABLE TO YOU OR ANY THIRD PARTY FOR ANY INDIRECT, CONSEQUENTIAL, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES, INCLUDING LOST PROFIT DAMAGES ARISING FROM YOUR USE OF THE SITE, CONTRIBUTIONS, MATERIALS OR ANY OTHER CONTENT THEREIN. NOTWITHSTANDING ANYTHING TO THE CONTRARY CONTAINED IN THESE TERMS, STUDYDADDY LIABILITY TO YOU IN RESPECT OF ANY LOSS OR DAMAGE SUFFERED BY YOU AND ARISING OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THESE TERMS, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, TORT OR FOR BREACH OF STATUTORY DUTY OR IN ANY OTHER WAY SHALL NOT EXCEED THE AMOUNT PAID BY YOU TO STUDYDADDY IN THE SIX MONTHS, OR $350, WHICHEVER IS GREATER. SOME JURISDICTIONS DO NOT ALLOW THE EXCLUSION OF CERTAIN WARRANTIES OR THE LIMITATION OR EXCLUSION OF LIABILITY FOR INCIDENTAL OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES. ACCORDINGLY, SOME OF THE ABOVE LIMITATIONS MAY NOT APPLY TO YOU AND YOU MAY HAVE ADDITIONAL RIGHTS. IN THAT CASE, STUDYDADDY LIABILITY WILL BE LIMITED TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW. THE EXCLUSIONS AND LIMITATIONS OF LIABILITY IN THESE TERMS OF USE WILL APPLY NOTWITHSTANDING ANY FAILURE OF ESSENTIAL PURPOSE OF ANY LIMITED REMEDY. THIS SECTION SHALL SURVIVE ANY EXPIRATION OR TERMINATION OF YOUR RELATIONSHIP WITH STUDYDADDY.

Contact Information

If you have any questions regarding these Terms of Use, please contact us at support@studydaddy.com. If you have any other questions, contact information is available at the Contact page on the Site.

StudyDaddy.com is owned and operated by Worbert Limited. 20 Christou Tsiarta Elma 2, 22, 1077, Nicosia, Cyprus.
